name: Coronavirus Blaster AR
description:
Coronavirus Blaster AR is a game where you shoot Coronaviruses in augmented reality!

You can upgrade your weapon, health, etc. by spending Research Points that you collect while killing the viruses.

There are multiple types of Coronaviruses with each type having a unique trait!

The AR version is only available for mobile (Android) which you can get with the APK file below, but you can still play the full game here on your browser.

You can also earn achievements and compete in the leaderboard with your Google Play account on the mobile version.

Have fun while staying at home! If you find any bugs/issues, please let me know.

*This is NOT meant to be educational! Everything you see in this game is entirely fictional!*
